tasks.title: Core Game Engine Implementation
tasks.description: Implement the core GBA-style game engine using HTML5 Canvas. Includes GameLoop, Display, Input, and SceneManager.
tasks.details: Refer to PRD Part 1 for technical specs (240x160 resolution, 60FPS). Implement a robust game loop and rendering system that mimics the GBA hardware limitations and capabilities.

subtasks.title: Setup HTML5 Canvas & Main Entry Point
subtasks.description: Setup HTML5 Canvas & Main Entry Point
subtasks.details: Create index.html and src/main.js. Initialize the canvas with 240x160 resolution and scale it up with CSS.

subtasks.title: Implement GameLoop
subtasks.details: Create a robust game loop using requestAnimationFrame that maintains a steady 60 FPS update cycle.

subtasks.title: Implement Display System
subtasks.details: Handle canvas rendering context, clearing, and scaling.

subtasks.title: Implement InputHandler
subtasks.details: Map keyboard keys to GBA buttons (A, B, Start, Select, D-Pad).

subtasks.title: Implement SceneManager
subtasks.details: Create a state machine to handle transitions between Intro, Overworld, Battle, etc.

tasks.title: Asset Integration & Loading
tasks.description: Integrate initial art assets and implement the asset loading system.
tasks.details: Load sprites and tilesets as described in Part 1 and Part 4 (Starters). Create an AssetLoader to handle asynchronous loading of images and audio.

subtasks.title: Create AssetLoader System
subtasks.details: Implement a system to asynchronously load images and audio files before the game starts.

subtasks.title: Load Initial Sprites
subtasks.details: Load sprites for the Protagonist, Professor Galdós, and the Starters.

subtasks.title: Load Initial Tilesets
subtasks.details: Load tilesets for the Player's Room and Tetuán District.

tasks.title: Intro Sequence Implementation
tasks.description: Implement the Intro Sequence and Character Selection.
tasks.details: Implement the intro sequence described in Part 3, including Professor Galdós, gender selection, name input, and the rival introduction.

subtasks.title: Implement Intro Scene Logic
subtasks.details: Script the sequence with Professor Galdós as described in the PRD.

subtasks.title: Implement Dialogue System
subtasks.details: Create a text rendering system with typewriter effect and GBA-style text boxes.

subtasks.title: Implement Character Selection UI
subtasks.details: Create the UI for choosing gender and naming the character.

tasks.title: Map Implementation: Tetuán
tasks.description: Implement the initial map: Tetuán District and Player's House.
tasks.details: Create the tilemaps for the Player's House (Part 3) and the Tetuán District (Part 5). Implement collision detection and basic NPC interaction.

tasks.title: Battle System Implementation
tasks.description: Implement the core Battle System (Gen 3 style).
tasks.details: Turn-based logic, damage calculation, Type effectiveness chart, Status effects, EXP gain, and Leveling. Include support for Double Battles as specified.

tasks.title: Pokémon Data & Roster
tasks.description: Define and implement data for all 151 Pokémon.
tasks.details: Create data structures for stats, movesets, evolutions, sprites, and metadata (Natures, Abilities). Implement the custom abilities (e.g., Espíritu Castizo).

tasks.title: Core Mechanics Implementation
tasks.description: Implement Game Mechanics: Natures, Abilities, Day/Night Cycle.
tasks.details: Implement the 25 Natures, Ability system (including hidden abilities), and the Day/Night cycle affecting spawns and visuals.

tasks.title: Inventory & Economy System
tasks.details: Bag system, Item usage (in/out of battle), Shops (Ultramarinos, etc.), TMs/HMs, and currency (Pesetas/Pokedollars).

tasks.title: World: Early Game (Districts 1-3)
tasks.description: Implement World Phase 1: Early Game Areas.
tasks.details: Maps, NPCs, and Events for: Route 1, District 2 (Chamberí), District 3 (Barrio de las Letras). Includes 'Pisos Secretos' introduction.

tasks.title: World: Gyms 1-4
tasks.details: Maps, Trainers, and Gym Leaders for: Plaza Mayor (Normal), Gran Vía (Electric), Palacio Real (Fighting), Retiro (Grass).

tasks.title: World: Gyms 5-8
tasks.details: Maps, Trainers, and Gym Leaders for: Las Ventas (Fire), Malasaña (Poison), Cuatro Torres (Psychic), Cibeles (Water).

tasks.title: Pokémon League & Finale
tasks.details: Victory Road (Casa de Campo), Elite Four battles (Carmencita, Arturo, Dolores, Santiago), and Champion Pablo battle.

tasks.title: UI/UX Implementation
tasks.details: Main Menu, Party Screen, Bag UI, Pokédex UI, and the custom 'MadriNav' features (Map, Radio, Calls).

tasks.title: Post-Game & Side Content
tasks.description: Implement Post-Game Content and Side Activities.
tasks.details: Legendary encounters (Metroño, etc.), Battle Tower (Azca), Safari Zone (Faunia), and Certámenes de San Isidro.

tasks.title: Audio System Implementation
tasks.details: Music manager for background tracks (Pasodoble, Chiptune), SFX playback, and dynamic audio switching.
